means: （使）转变( convert的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He was apparently quite converted from his anarchist views.
sentence.Network_cn: 显然他基本上完全放弃无政府主义的观点了。

sentence.Network_en: He quickly converted me to the joys of cross-country skiing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他很快就使我迷上了越野滑雪。

sentence.Network_en: The analogue signals from the video tape are converted into digital code.
sentence.Network_cn: 采自该录像带的模拟信号被转换成数字代码。

entry.def: If one thing is converted or converts into another, it is changed into a different form.

example.ex: The signal will be converted into digital code.
example.tran: 信号会被转变为数字代码。

example.ex: ...naturally occurring substances which the body can convert into vitamins.
example.tran: 自然产生的能被身体转化成维生素的物质

entry.def: If someone converts a room or building, they alter it in order to use it for a different purpose.

example.ex: By converting the loft, they were able to have two extra bedrooms.
example.tran: 把阁楼改造一下，他们就可以多出两间卧室。

example.ex: ...the entrepreneur who wants to convert County Hall into an hotel...
example.tran: 想把市政厅改建成旅馆的企业家

entry.def: If you convert a vehicle or piece of equipment, you change it so that it can use a different fuel.

example.ex: Save money by converting your car to unleaded...
example.tran: 将车改装一下，使用无铅汽油，这样可以省钱。

example.ex: The programme to convert every gas burner in Britain took 10 years.
example.tran: 完成对英国所有煤气灶的改造花了10年时间。

entry.def: If you convert a quantity from one system of measurement to another, you calculate what the quantity is in the second system.

example.ex: Converting metric measurements to U.S. equivalents is easy.
example.tran: 将公制计量换算成美制计量非常简单。

entry.tran: (使)改变宗教（或政治）信仰;(使)皈依;(使)归附
entry.def: If someone converts you, they persuade you to change your religious or political beliefs. You can also say that someone converts to a different religion.

example.ex: If you try to convert him, you could find he just walks away...
example.tran: 如果你试图改变他的信仰，他就会走开。

example.ex: He was a major influence in converting Godwin to political radicalism...
example.tran: 戈德温变成政治激进主义者主要是受他的影响。

entry.tran: 皈依者;归附者;改变信仰者
entry.def: A convert is someone who has changed their religious or political beliefs.

example.ex: She, too, was a convert to Roman Catholicism.
...a Muslim convert now known as Yusuf Islam.
example.tran: 现以优素福·伊斯兰这个名字为大家熟知的伊斯兰教皈依者

entry.def: If someone converts you to something, they make you very enthusiastic about it.

example.ex: He quickly converted me to the joys of cross-country skiing.
example.tran: 他很快就使我迷上了越野滑雪。

entry.tran: 刚迷上…的人;最近开始热衷于…的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a convert to something, you mean that they have recently become very enthusiastic about it.

example.tran: 最近开始热衷于素食主义的人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无争论余地的,无疑的,明白的

ad加强[有"向"之意]+vert转+ise表动词→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……

Sentence.sentence: rain forests should not be converted into pastures or farms
